00013 }

00020 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 int SpGlslVertexProgram::getParameterRegister( const char* acName )
00022 {
00023     // get the current program handle, if there is one
00024     GLuint uiUserData = 0;
00025     getUserData(&uiUserData, sizeof(GLuint));
00026 
00027     // return if program has not been compiled
00028     if(!uiUserData)
00029         return -1;
00030 
00031     // request a uniform location to use as the register
00032     int iRegister = -1;
00033     iRegister = glGetUniformLocationARB( uiUserData, acName );
00034 
00035     // return the register index
00036     return iRegister;
00037 }
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 bool SpGlslVertexProgram::setParameter1i(
00040     const char* acName, int iX)
00041 {
00042     // get a register for the parameter
00043     int iRegister = getParameterRegister( acName );
00044     if(iRegister < 0) return false;
00045 
00046     // assign the parameter to the given register
00047     glUniform1iARB( iRegister, iX );
00048     return true;
00049 }
